Grundlagen zu Redox- und Protolysereakti: Basics of redox and protolysis reactions as well as a first look at organic substance classes and energy carriers.
Elektronenübergänge als zentrales Reakti: Understand electron transfers as a central reaction principle and apply it to galvanic cells and electrolysis.
Die lernende Person kann Oxidation und R: The learner can describe oxidation and reduction as electron transfers, assign oxidizing and reducing agents, and explain the donor-acceptor principle using examples.
Die lernende Person kann Oxidationszahle: The learner can derive oxidation numbers for atoms in compounds and balance redox equations using oxidation numbers.
Die lernende Person kann aus Metallabsch: The learner can create a shortened redox series from metal depositions and measurements of simple galvanic cells and identify donor/acceptor pairs.
Die lernende Person kann Aufbau und Funk: The learner can explain the structure and function of a galvanic element, formulate electrode reactions, and qualitatively explain the cell voltage.
Die lernende Person kann an einem Beispi: The learner can explain electrolysis using an example, state molar relationships, and work out differences to the galvanic element.
Säuren und Basen nach Arrhenius und Brøn: Characterize acids and bases according to Arrhenius and Brønsted, calculate pH values, and safely perform titrations.
Die lernende Person kann typische anorga: The learner can name typical inorganic acids and bases based on the Arrhenius definition and state their formulas confidently.
Die lernende Person kann Stoffmengen, Ko: The learner can calculate amounts of substance, concentrations, and pH values of strong acids and bases and check measurement results for plausibility.
Die lernende Person kann eine Titration: The learner can professionally perform a titration with an endpoint, select indicators, and calculate the concentration of the sample from volumes.
Die lernende Person kann Protolysegleich: The learner can formulate protolysis equations, identify corresponding acid-base pairs, and justify proton transfers.
Die lernende Person kann mithilfe des Br: The learner can estimate reaction directions using the Brønsted model, detect oxonium and hydroxide ions, and reflect on model concepts.
Homologe Reihen, isomere Strukturen und: Understand homologous series, isomeric structures, and initial functional groups as the basis of organic chemistry.
Die lernende Person kann Alkane und Alke: The learner can name alkanes and alkenes correctly according to nomenclature, sketch structural formulas, and distinguish simple isomerisms.
Die lernende Person kann den Einfluss vo: The learner can justify the influence of Van der Waals forces and hydrogen bonds on melting and boiling temperatures as well as solubilities of selected substances.
Die lernende Person kann den Mechanismus: The learner can explain the mechanism of bromination of an alkane and represent intermediates using suitable models.
Die lernende Person kann Eigenschaften v: The learner can derive properties of ethanol from the hydroxyl group and assess effects and risks in everyday life.
E.4 Erdöl und Erdgas – Brennstoffe: E.4 Petroleum and Natural Gas – Fuels
Fossile Rohstoffe gewinnen, trennen und: Extract, separate, and evaluate fossil raw materials under sustainability aspects.
Die lernende Person kann Lagerstätten, F: The learner can explain deposits, extraction methods, and ecological risks of petroleum and natural gas extraction.
Die lernende Person kann die fraktionier: The learner can qualitatively describe fractional distillation as well as thermal cracking and assign typical products.
Die lernende Person kann Verbrennungsrea: The learner can compare combustion reactions of various hydrocarbons and discuss energy figures in context.
Energieumwandlung in Brennstoffzellen un: Discuss energy conversion in fuel cells and accumulators.
Die lernende Person kann die Vorgänge an: The learner can describe the processes at the electrodes of a hydrogen-oxygen fuel cell and discuss its use as energy storage.
Die lernende Person kann Aufbau und Funk: The learner can explain the structure and function of a lithium-ion battery in simplified form and name possible uses.
Die lernende Person kann die elektrochem: The learner can qualitatively interpret the electrochemical processes in the lead accumulator and name opportunities and limits as energy storage.
Funktionelle Gruppen, Reaktionstypen und: Analyze functional groups, reaction types, and everyday substance classes.
Intramolekulare Bindungen und intermolek: Analyze intramolecular bonds and intermolecular forces and link them to reaction mechanisms.
Die lernende Person kann Metall-, Ionen-: The learner can explain metallic, ionic, and covalent bonds as well as molecular geometries using the VSEPR model.
Die lernende Person kann Dipolkräfte, Wa: The learner can explain dipole forces, hydrogen bonds, ion-dipole interactions, and Van der Waals forces using examples.
Die lernende Person kann Schmelz- und Si: The learner can justify melting and boiling temperatures as well as solubilities of homologous series using molecular forces.
Die lernende Person kann radikalische Su: The learner can explain radical substitutions and electrophilic additions to unsaturated compounds and state detection methods.
Die lernende Person kann den Mesomerieme: The learner can explain the resonance mechanism in benzene and model electrophilic substitution on the ring.
Eigenschaften, Nachweise und Reaktionen: Compare properties, detection methods, and reactions of alkanols, aldehydes, and ketones.
Die lernende Person kann Alkanole benenn: The learner can name alkanols, use proper structural formula representations, and discuss constitutional isomers.
Die lernende Person kann Dipol-Dipol-Wec: The learner can use dipole-dipole interactions and hydrogen bonds to interpret solubility and boiling temperature.
Die lernende Person kann Reaktionsgleich: The learner can formulate reaction equations between haloalkanes and hydroxide ions and describe tests for halide ions.
Die lernende Person kann primäre, sekund: The learner can distinguish primary, secondary, and tertiary alkanols and explain oxidation products and their tests.
Die lernende Person kann SN1- und SN2-Me: The learner can contrast SN1 and SN2 mechanisms and discuss steric and inductive effects.
Carbonsäuren und Ester strukturell besch: Describe carboxylic acids and esters structurally, balance reactions, and assess applications.
Die lernende Person kann Carboxylgruppen: The learner can detect carboxyl groups, represent homologous series, and write structural formulas confidently.
Die lernende Person kann den Einfluss po: The learner can explain the influence of polar bonds, inductive effects, and resonance on the acid strength of carboxylic acids.
Die lernende Person kann Kondensationsre: The learner can formulate condensation reactions between alcohols and carboxylic acids and name applications.
Die lernende Person kann saure und alkal: The learner can distinguish acidic and alkaline ester hydrolysis and balance reaction products.
Die lernende Person kann Di- und Tricarb: The learner can describe di- and tricarboxylic acids structurally and deepen mechanisms of alkaline ester hydrolysis.
Seifenherstellung, Tensidstruktur und Wa: Understand soap production, surfactant structure, and washing processes.
Die lernende Person kann die alkalische: The learner can describe the alkaline hydrolysis of fats and separate products.
Die lernende Person kann Aufbau von Seif: The learner can explain the structure of soaps at interfaces and describe the emulsifying effect.
Die lernende Person kann Faktoren der Wa: The learner can discuss factors of washing efficiency such as temperature, water hardness, and surfactant concentration.
Die lernende Person kann permanente und: The learner can distinguish permanent and temporary hardness and explain methods for softening.
Strategien zur Lebensmittelkonservierung: Compare and evaluate strategies for food preservation.
Die lernende Person kann historische und: The learner can contrast historical and modern methods of food preservation and name risks.
Die lernende Person kann einen qualitati: The learner can perform a qualitative test for ascorbic acid and interpret it as an antioxidant.
Die lernende Person kann Wirkweise, Dosi: The learner can explain the mode of action, dosage, and legal aspects of sorbic acid as a preservative.
Die lernende Person kann den Gehalt von: The learner can determine the content of ascorbic acid or p-hydroxybenzoic acid esters using suitable methods.
Q2 Naturstoffe und Synthesechemie: Q2 Natural Products and Synthetic Chemistry
Proteine, Kohlenhydrate, Fette sowie Kun: Analyze proteins, carbohydrates, fats, and plastics and develop sustainable synthesis pathways.
Aufbau und Reaktionen von Aminosäuren, P: Investigate structure and reactions of amino acids, proteins, carbohydrates, and fats.
Die lernende Person kann Struktur, Zwitt: The learner can depict structure, zwitterion formation, and acid-base properties of proteinogenic amino acids.
Die lernende Person kann Kondensationsre: The learner can formulate condensation reactions between amino acids and describe the structure of proteins.
Die lernende Person kann Mono-, Di- und: The learner can distinguish mono-, di-, and polysaccharides, explain tests, and interpret structural features.
Die lernende Person kann Zusammensetzung: The learner can explain composition, degree of saturation, and hydrogenation of fats and discuss significance for nutrition.
Die lernende Person kann Dünnschichtchro: The learner can plan thin-layer chromatography of amino acids, choose solvents, and evaluate Rf values.
Polymerklassen, Synthesereaktionen und R: Compare polymer classes, synthesis reactions, and recycling strategies.
Die lernende Person kann Thermoplaste, D: The learner can distinguish thermoplastics, thermosets, and elastomers based on their structure and properties.
Die lernende Person kann den Mechanismus: The learner can sketch the mechanism of radical polymerization and explain the production of polyethylene.
Die lernende Person kann die Bildung von: The learner can describe the formation of polyesters or polyamides and assign monomers.
Die lernende Person kann werkstoffliches: The learner can explain mechanical and feedstock recycling and discuss ecological aspects.
Die lernende Person kann die Bildung von: The learner can explain the formation of polyurethanes and particularities of the reaction control.
Aromatische Systeme strukturell und reak: Deepen understanding of aromatic systems structurally and reactively.
Die lernende Person kann das delokalisie: The learner can explain the delocalized π-system and the special stability of benzene using the resonance model.
Die lernende Person kann den Mechanismus: The learner can explain the mechanism of electrophilic substitution on aromatics and discuss reaction conditions.
Die lernende Person kann induktive und m: The learner can explain inductive and mesomeric effects in secondary substitutions and discuss examples such as toluene or phenol.
Biobasierte Polymere und elastische Werk: Evaluate bio-based polymers and elastic materials.
Die lernende Person kann Synthese und Ei: The learner can describe synthesis and properties of polylactic acid (PLA) and name fields of application.
Die lernende Person kann Aufbau und Eige: The learner can explain structure and properties of simple copolymers and discuss advantages over homopolymers.
Die lernende Person kann Synthese und Vu: The learner can explain synthesis and vulcanization of synthetic rubber as well as properties of modified cellulose.
Gleichgewichte verstehen, beeinflussen u: Understand, influence, and quantitatively describe equilibria.
Dynamische Gleichgewichte qualitativ deu: Qualitatively interpret and quantitatively calculate dynamic equilibria.
Die lernende Person kann das gleichzeiti: The learner can experimentally show the simultaneous presence of reactants and products and define the dynamic equilibrium.
Die lernende Person kann Gleichgewichtsk: The learner can calculate equilibrium constants of simplified systems and interprets the numerical value in context.
Die lernende Person kann den Einfluss vo: The learner can qualitatively predict the influence of concentration, pressure, and temperature on the position of an equilibrium.
Die lernende Person kann erläutern, wie: The learner can explain how catalysts influence the establishment of an equilibrium and name examples of homogeneous and heterogeneous catalysis.
Die lernende Person kann das Haber-Bosch: The learner can analyze the Haber-Bosch process, apply LMA equations with different stoichiometric factors, and calculate concentrations.
Säure-Base-Gleichgewichte quantitativ er: Quantitatively record acid-base equilibria and evaluate titration curves.
Die lernende Person kann Protolysegleich: The learner can set up protolysis equations and safely identify corresponding pairs.
Die lernende Person kann Stärke von Säur: The learner can compare strength of acids and bases using pKa and pKb values.
pH-Werte starker Lösungen berechnen: Calculate pH values of strong solutions
Die lernende Person kann für starke Säur: The learner can determine pH values from concentrations for strong acids and bases and interpret measurement results.
Die lernende Person kann Titrationsdaten: The learner can evaluate titration data, determine equivalence points, and qualitatively describe polyprotic systems.
Die lernende Person kann Pufferlösungen: The learner can quantitatively describe buffer solutions using the Henderson-Hasselbalch equation.
Redoxreihen, Elektrolyse und Korrosion m: Link redox series, electrolysis, and corrosion with equilibrium concepts.
Die lernende Person kann Standardpotenzi: The learner can interpret standard potentials and calculate cell voltages under standard conditions.
Die lernende Person kann Elektrolyse mit: The learner can describe electrolysis using renewable energy sources and discuss efficiency questions.
Die lernende Person kann Lokalelemente e: The learner can explain local cells, justify corrosion protection measures, and explain sacrificial anodes.
Die lernende Person kann Konzentrationsz: The learner can calculate concentration cells using the Nernst equation and make statements about cell voltage.
Puffersysteme qualitativ und quantitativ: Classify buffer systems qualitatively and quantitatively.
Die lernende Person kann das Phosphat-Pu: The learner can describe the phosphate buffer system and justify the effect using Le Chatelier's principle.
Die lernende Person kann Kohlensäure-Hyd: The learner can qualitatively explain carbonic acid-bicarbonate and ammonium buffers in open systems.
Die lernende Person kann für Pufferlösun: The learner can perform quantitative pH calculations for buffer solutions.
Reaktionsgeschwindigkeiten messen, deute: Measure, interpret, and influence reaction rates.
Die lernende Person kann mittlere und mo: The learner can determine average and instantaneous reaction rates from concentration-time diagrams.
Die lernende Person kann den Einfluss vo: The learner can qualitatively explain the influence of substance type, concentration, and degree of division on the reaction rate.
Die lernende Person kann den Verlauf ein: The learner can analyze the course of an autocatalytic reaction such as oxalic acid with permanganate.
Thermodynamische Prinzipien, nachhaltige: Evaluate thermodynamic principles, sustainable energy carriers, and modern detergents.
Thermodynamische Sätze, Enthalpie und En: Use thermodynamic laws, enthalpy, and entropy to evaluate chemical processes.
Die lernende Person kann offene, geschlo: The learner can distinguish open, closed, and isolated systems and qualitatively explain conservation of energy.
Die lernende Person kann Reaktionsenthal: The learner can determine reaction enthalpies using chemically Hess's law and simple calorimetry approaches.
Die lernende Person kann den Einfluss de: The learner can justify the influence of temperature on reaction rates using collision theory.
Die lernende Person kann Entropiebeiträg: The learner can discuss entropy contributions and make statements about spontaneity using the Gibbs-Helmholtz equation.
Energieumwandlungen in Brennstoffzellen: Evaluate energy conversions in fuel cells and biogenic fuels.
Die lernende Person kann Elektrodenreakt: The learner can explain electrode reactions in acidic and alkaline fuel cells and discuss advantages and disadvantages.
Die lernende Person kann Aufbau von Trig: The learner can describe the structure of triglycerides and discuss ecological consequences of their use.
Die lernende Person kann die Gewinnung v: The learner can describe the production of glucose and its conversion to ethanol by fermentation and assess benefit-risk aspects.
Die lernende Person kann Aufbau und Eins: The learner can evaluate the structure and use of lithium-ion batteries in electric vehicles.
Moderne Waschmittelrezepturen hinsichtli: Analyze modern detergent formulations regarding sustainability.
Die lernende Person kann anionische, kat: The learner can characterize anionic, cationic, and nonionic surfactants based on their structure.
Die lernende Person kann Funktionen von: The learner can explain functions of softeners, bleaching systems, enzymes, and auxiliaries.
Die lernende Person kann ökologische, ök: The learner can reflect on ecological, economic, and social aspects of modern detergents.
Die lernende Person kann Zeolith-Enthärt: The learner can explain zeolite softeners structurally and describe biological degradation pathways of surfactants.
Die lernende Person kann einfache MO-Dia: The learner can interpret simple MO diagrams (e.g. O2, N2) and derive bond order.
Die lernende Person kann Konstitution, K: The learner can distinguish and represent constitution, configuration (R/S, E/Z), and conformation.
Die lernende Person kann IR- und 1H-NMR-: The learner can assign IR and 1H-NMR basic signals to simple organic structures.
Die lernende Person kann SN1- und SN2-Me: The learner can interpret SN1 and SN2 mechanisms regarding kinetics, solvent, and substrate.
Die lernende Person kann Reaktivität von: The learner can justify the reactivity of aldehydes vs. ketones mechanistically.
Die lernende Person kann Grignard-Reagen: The learner can use Grignard reagents and formulate reaction steps.
Die lernende Person kann Reaktivität von: The learner can order and justify the reactivity of chlorides, anhydrides, and esters.
Die lernende Person kann Transesterifizi: The learner can plan transesterifications and assess equilibria.
Die lernende Person kann intramolekulare: The learner can explain intramolecular ester formations and lactone stability.
Die lernende Person kann CMC, Schaumbild: The learner can quantify CMC, foaming, and dirt carrying capacity.
Die lernende Person kann Kriterien der T: The learner can explain criteria of surfactant biodegradability.
Die lernende Person kann redoxaktive Kon: The learner can evaluate redox-active preservation strategies.
Die lernende Person kann Proteinstruktur: The learner can explain protein structure levels and folding factors.
Die lernende Person kann einfache Michae: The learner can interpret simple Michaelis-Menten relationships.
Die lernende Person kann glykosidische B: The learner can explain glycosidic bonds and hydrolysis/linkage.
Die lernende Person kann Glasübergang un: The learner can interpret glass transition and melting point of polymers.
Die lernende Person kann Eigenschaftspro: The learner can explain property profiles (strength, barrier, transparency) structure-related.
Die lernende Person kann Abbaumechanisme: The learner can explain degradation mechanisms and conditions for biopolymers.
Die lernende Person kann den Mechanismus: The learner can explain the mechanism of electrophilic substitution via the σ-complex.
Die lernende Person kann Friedel-Crafts-: The learner can plan and control Friedel-Crafts alkylation/acylation.
Die lernende Person kann Korrosionsschut: The learner can evaluate corrosion protection strategies for metals/alloys.
Die lernende Person kann Kp und Kc umrec: The learner can convert Kp and Kc and discuss application limits.
Die lernende Person kann Temperaturabhän: The learner can calculate temperature dependencies of equilibria.
Die lernende Person kann gekoppelte Glei: The learner can analyze coupled equilibria qualitatively/quantitatively.
Die lernende Person kann Titrationskurve: The learner can evaluate titration curves of strong/weak acids/bases.
Die lernende Person kann mehrprotonige S: The learner can calculate polyprotic acid-base systems and evaluate buffer properties.
Die lernende Person kann pE/pH-Diagramme: The learner can interpret pE/pH diagrams and derive stability ranges.
Die lernende Person kann Elektrolyseproz: The learner can link electrolysis processes with redox equilibria.
Die lernende Person kann Puffer für defi: The learner can construct buffers for defined pH ranges and calculate capacity.
Die lernende Person kann Aktivierungsene: The learner can determine activation energies from temperature dependencies.
Die lernende Person kann mehrstufige Mec: The learner can derive multistep mechanisms from rate laws.
Die lernende Person kann hetero-/homogen: The learner can evaluate hetero-/homogeneous and enzymatic catalysis regarding activation.
Die lernende Person kann freie Reaktions: The learner can calculate Gibbs free energy and interpret spontaneity/yield.
Die lernende Person kann einfache statis: The learner can classify simple statistical distributions regarding energetics.
Die lernende Person kann Zellspannungen: The learner can calculate cell voltages under operating conditions using Nernst equation.
Die lernende Person kann Wirkungsgrade v: The learner can calculate and compare efficiencies of various energy converters.
Die lernende Person kann vereinfachte Ök: The learner can create and interpret simplified life cycle assessments for energy carriers.
Die lernende Person kann Atomökonomie, E: The learner can calculate atom economy, E-factor, and PMI for formulations.
Die lernende Person kann Struktur-Eigens: The learner can optimize structure-property relationships of surfactants for detergents.
